## Severity
- [ ] Critical (P0) - Severe degradation affecting all users
- [ ] High (P1) - Major slowdown affecting many users
- [ ] Medium (P2) - Noticeable slowdown affecting some users
- [ ] Low (P3) - Minor performance issue affecting few users
